title: Different OS, same country?
body: Hi, Just a question I want to ask.. Is it possible to connect with my friend (NA, Windows) when I'm like...  NA, mac?

replies.body: Yes. Game doesn't take your operating system into account for matchmaking.

The Regions are the same, so you can play, chat and hang out in the same club as your friend. No worries here! ^.^

Let me know if you have any questions!
